title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Science Instructional Competency Development Course Utilizing Digital Educational Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency with digital devices (smartphones) and secondary-level science knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can create visual explanatory materials for scientific concepts using digital platforms.
Learners can explain the process of collecting and analyzing real-time science experiment data using smartphones.
Learners can design collaborative scientific inquiry activities among peers using digital collaboration tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
